mapper.insert: INSERT INTO logic ( original_no, business_no, summary, contents, category, generating_date, source_no, user_id ) VALUES (uuid(), #{business_no}, #{summary}, #{contents}, #{category}, now(), #{source_no}, (select user_id from user_info where id = #{id}) )
INSERT INTO evaluation (evaluation_no, score, original_no, evaluating_date, user_id, comment) VALUES (uuid(), #{flag}, #{original_no}, now(), #{user_id}, #{comment} );
mapper.select: select count(e.evaluation_no) sum, count(e2.evaluation_no) sumOfAccept from (select * from evaluation) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from evaluation where score = 'Accept' ) e2 on e.evaluation_no = e2.evaluation_no where e.original_no = #{original_no};
